languages.text: "В твоем гиблом разуме нет правды, гвардеец. Раз усомнившись, ты встал на путь греха и не избежишь правосудия. Ибо сказано: отчаявшийся — предаст, а предавшего настигнет кара Его".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "В твое гиблом разуме нет правды, гвардеец. Раз усомнившись, ты встал на путь греха и не избежишь правосудия. Ибо сказано: отчаявшийся — предаст, а предавшего настигнет кара Его".

languages.text: "There is no truth in your doomed mind, Guardsman. By succumbing to doubt, you have embarked on the path of the wicked — and now, you will not escape judgement. For so it is said that all who despair shall betray, and all betrayal shall draw His retribution."
languages.original_text: "В твоем гиблом разуме нет правды, гвардеец. Раз усомнившись, ты встал на путь греха и не избежишь правосудия. Ибо сказано: отчаявшийся — предаст, а предавшего настигнет кара Его".

languages.text: "In Eurem dem Untergang geweihten Geist liegt keine Wahrheit, Soldat. Ihr habt dem Zweifel nachgegeben und Euch auf den Pfad der Bösen geschlagen – und nun werdet Ihr Eurem Urteil nicht entkommen. Denn es heißt, dass alle Verzweifelten Verrat begehen und jeder Verrat Seine Vergeltung nach sich zieht."
languages.original_text: "There is no truth in your doomed mind, Guardsman. By succumbing to doubt, you have embarked on the path of the wicked — and now, you will not escape judgement. For so it is said that all who despair shall betray, and all betrayal shall draw His retribution."

traits.locale_text: "In Eurem dem Untergang geweihten Geist liegt keine Wahrheit, Soldat. Ihr habt dem Zweifel nachgegeben und Euch auf den Pfad der Bösen geschlagen – und nun werdet Ihr Eurem Urteil nicht entkommen. Denn es heißt, dass alle Verzweifelten Verrat begehen und jeder Verrat Seine Vergeltung nach sich zieht."

languages.text: « Il n'y a aucune vérité dans votre esprit condamné, garde. En succombant au doute, vous vous êtes engagé dans la voie du mal. Et vous n'échapperez pas à votre jugement. Après tout, ne dit-on pas que ceux qui désespèrent cèdent à la trahison, et que toute trahison engendre Son châtiment ? »
languages.original_text: "There is no truth in your doomed mind, Guardsman. By succumbing to doubt, you have embarked on the path of the wicked — and now, you will not escape judgement. For so it is said that all who despair shall betray, and all betrayal shall draw His retribution."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a aucune vérité dans votre esprit condamné, garde. En succombant au doute, vous vous êtes engagé dans la voie du mal. Et vous n'échapperez pas à votre jugement. Après tout, ne dit-on pas que ceux qui désespèrent cèdent à la trahison, et que toute trahison engendre Son châtiment ? »

languages.text: “你的思维已经扭曲，对真相视而不见，士兵。你任由怀疑摆布，踏上了罪恶的道路。如今，你必将面对祂的审判。所有堕入绝望的人最终都会选择背叛，而所有背叛都必将招致祂的惩罚。”
languages.original_text: "There is no truth in your doomed mind, Guardsman. By succumbing to doubt, you have embarked on the path of the wicked — and now, you will not escape judgement. For so it is said that all who despair shall betray, and all betrayal shall draw His retribution."

traits.locale_text: “你的思维已经扭曲，对真相视而不见，士兵。你任由怀疑摆布，踏上了罪恶的道路。如今，你必将面对祂的审判。所有堕入绝望的人最终都会选择背叛，而所有背叛都必将招致祂的惩罚。”

languages.text: «No hay verdad en su mente condenada, Guardia. Al sucumbir a la duda, ha emprendido el camino del mal, y ahora se enfrentará a su juicio. Pues es sabido que toda desesperación lleva a la traición, y toda traición conlleva Su castigo».
languages.original_text: "There is no truth in your doomed mind, Guardsman. By succumbing to doubt, you have embarked on the path of the wicked — and now, you will not escape judgement. For so it is said that all who despair shall betray, and all betrayal shall draw His retribution."

traits.locale_text: «No hay verdad en su mente condenada, Guardia. Al sucumbir a la duda, ha emprendido el camino del mal, y ahora se enfrentará a su juicio. Pues es sabido que toda desesperación lleva a la traición, y toda traición conlleva Su castigo».

languages.text: 「ガーズマンよ。あなたの絶望的な心に真実などない。疑念に屈することで、あなたは邪悪な道を歩み始めた。そして今、もはや裁きを免れることはない。昔から言われている通り、絶望する者はすべて裏切り、すべての裏切りは陛下の報復を招くのだ」
languages.original_text: "There is no truth in your doomed mind, Guardsman. By succumbing to doubt, you have embarked on the path of the wicked — and now, you will not escape judgement. For so it is said that all who despair shall betray, and all betrayal shall draw His retribution."

traits.locale_text: 「ガーズマンよ。あなたの絶望的な心に真実などない。疑念に屈することで、あなたは邪悪な道を歩み始めた。そして今、もはや裁きを免れることはない。昔から言われている通り、絶望する者はすべて裏切り、すべての裏切りは陛下の報復を招くのだ」

languages.text: "Lanetli zihninde gerçek diye bir şey yok Muhafız. Şüpheye yenik düşerek kötülüğün yoluna girdin. Yargıdan kaçamayacaksın. Çünkü 'Çaresizliğe düşen herkes ihanet eder ve her ihanet O'nun intikamını hak eder.'"
languages.original_text: "There is no truth in your doomed mind, Guardsman. By succumbing to doubt, you have embarked on the path of the wicked — and now, you will not escape judgement. For so it is said that all who despair shall betray, and all betrayal shall draw His retribution."

traits.locale_text: "Lanetli zihninde gerçek diye bir şey yok Muhafız. Şüpheye yenik düşerek kötülüğün yoluna girdin. Yargıdan kaçamayacaksın. Çünkü 'Çaresizliğe düşen herkes ihanet eder ve her ihanet O'nun intikamını hak eder.'"
